TopicTitle: Can someone make me a Camera Mod?

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone, I like to make cinematics of KSP, and I actually like the KSP2 camera controls where you can use the arrow keys to pan and tilt the camera. I have no idea how difficult it is to do, so I'm not expecting much, but if someone could hook me up, I'll make it worth your while. I run a space logistics business. I'm just getting off the ground, but we can work something out.

Have a spectacular night everyone!
